entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "network error" - unhandled exception - Blazor WASM - Streaming http requests from IAsyncEnumerable api endpoint #55982
  • QuickGrid ItemsProvider called first time with Count=null when using Virtualize=true #55979
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #55977
  • Perf regression: mapaction, multiple_queries #55976
  • ProjectTemplates instructions error #55975
  • Add a `Scope` property to the `Authorize` attribute #55973
    Backlog
  • HealthCheckMiddleware unexpected behavior, still running through the other middlewares in the chain #55972
  • Controller action with `Async` suffix causes issues when resolving url from `IUrlHelper.Action` #55967

Closed

  • Errors when publishing new Blazor WASM version (no nuget/framework updates) #55978
  • Perf improvement: json, plaintext_spring #55959
  • Perf regression: endpoint #55966
  • route /_adminer.php throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException #55974
  • Server Interactive Blazor Pages do not respect Sign-out with multiple browser tabs #55925
  • Facing an issue with a newly created ASP.NET Core MVC project. #55736
  • Unhandled exception rendering component: Could not load file or assembly #55686

PullRequests

Created

  • Update https://docs.microsoft.com to https://learn.microsoft.com #55970
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Ensuring cancellation of tokens when using GetLinkedCancellationToken(a,b) #55968
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Merged

  • Quarantine flaky MVC functional tests #55935
    area-mvc, 9.0-preview6
  • Suggest git clean in Build Errors #55964
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview6
  • Use more specific MSBuild property name for dotnet-getdocument #55958
    area-commandlinetools, feature-openapi, 9.0-preview6
  • Call NuGetAuthenticate after SetupNuGetSources #55960
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview6

Updated

  • Allow HTTP2 encoder to split headers across frames #55322
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • UnixCertificateManager: implement IsTrusted. #55335
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution
  • Update WithOpenApi docs and scrub description IDs #55924
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Log whether the localization resource is found or not #55897
    community-contribution, area-ui-rendering
  • Remove redundant check #55945
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Add nullable annotation to ResultContext<TOptions>.Result #55948
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Pass through CancellationToken #55941
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Update AuthenticationSchemeProvider.cs public constructor summary punctuation #55919
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Ensure that the hub client proxy generator correctly processes both explicit and inferred generic type arguments #55862
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • [release/2.1] (deps): Bump modules/EntityFrameworkCore from `74055e1` to `6d79997` #55498
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 2.1.x
  • Enable input number component to support type='range' attribute #55583
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
